name: Contact List Manager
info: A full-stack contact management application built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB, enabling users to add, edit, delete, and search contacts with a clean and responsive interface.

name: Movie Dux
info: A React-based movie app for seamless movie search and exploration, featuring real-time data and interactive UI.

name: Bug Blaster
info: A React-based bug tracking platform where users can post, manage, and track software bugs with an intuitive and responsive interface.

name: Go Foots!
info: A frontend e-commerce website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling users to browse and add shoes to their cart.
